Key Match Events: Sam Curran took the wicket of Glenn Phillips
Glenn Phillips was dropped twice on 8 and 40
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler expressed confidence in his captaincy decisions
Kane Williamson had a few surprises in his captaincy approach
Miscellaneous Highlights: England chose to bat first, a decision Buttler rarely follows
Moeen Ali bowled for the first time in the tournament
Liam Livingstone felt some soreness in his ankle and spent the last few overs off the field
Others: Daryl Mitchell and Glenn Phillips sent the ball soaring straight to Chris Jordan, resulting in their dismissals

New Zealand's captain, Kane Williamson, had a few surprises in his captaincy approach, such as bringing in Moeen Santner and Ish Sodhi early and focusing on bowling to Buttler and Alex Hales during the powerplay
